name: Beyond Good 70% Cocoa Pure Dark Chocolate | 6 Pack - Chocolate Bars | Organic, Direct Trade, Vegan, Kosher, Non-GMO | Single Origin Heirloom Madagascar Dark Chocolate
short_description: 70% COCOA PURE DARK CHOCOLATE - A showcase of single-origin Madagascar cocoa. This bar offers a perfect balance of flavor, starting with a smooth, brown sugar sweetness and finishing with vibrant notes of raspberry and cherry.

SINGLE ORIGIN MADAGASCAR CHOCOLATE – Madagascar is home to the Earth’s most uniquely flavorful cocoa beans. That high quality cocoa is the simple reason our chocolate has subtle but distinct notes of red fruit like cranberry and cherry.

CERTIFIED DIRECT TRADE – This goes above and beyond the standards of Fair Trade certification. We work directly with premium cocoa farmers in Madagascar. Removing middlemen means a sustainable, completely transparent supply chain where farmers earn 3-5 times the fair trade standard.

BAKING OR SNACKING – Our chocolate is designed to be delicious on its own as a snack, but it doubles as a high quality baking ingredient. Use this dark chocolate in any recipe that calls for dark or bittersweet chocolate. Bringing the bright flavors of Madagascar cocoa into your kitchen is an easy way to liven up your favorite cakes, cookies, buns and ice creams.

ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT – Our cocoa grows in an agroforestry environment that contributes to healthy ecosystems and reforestation in Madagascar. The farms we work with contain over 3,000 shade trees and are home to five species of endangered lemurs.

name: Endangered Species Dark Chocolate Bar w/Sea Salt & Almonds (72% cocoa)
short_description: CHOCOLATE: Each bar has only a handful of real, responsibly sourced, health-conscious ingredients—without any artificial sweeteners or additives.
Dark Chocolate w/ Sea Salt & Almonds (72% cocoa)

HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS: We believe that to craft premium world-class chocolate, there’s no way around it: you need the best ingredients. Our clean, natural ingredients are selected for their quality and sustainability, with a dedicated team constantly focused on finding the ideal ingredients for maximum taste.

NON-GMO, FAIRTRADE CHOCOLATE - We care about the farmers who grow the cocoa that we use in our products, and we’re dedicated to supporting communities that practice sustainable farming practices. We commit to paying premiums so that you can be sure that our chocolate, made in America, uses fair trade cocoa that can be traced back to Fairtrade farms in West Africa.

WHY WE DO IT: 10% of annual net profits support conservation efforts protecting wildlife and their habitats. With over $1.4 million generated in the past three years alone, each chocolate purchase adds up to big support that helps wildlife thrive.

name: Valrhona Premium French Baking Dark Chocolate Discs (Feves). Classic GUANAJA 70% Cacao. Easy Melt. Easy to chop. Intense & Smooth with Bitter Notes. Sauces, Cakes, Mousses, Frostings 250g (Pack of 1)
short_description: WONDERFUL AND UNIQUE TASTE - GUANAJA develops extraordinary bitterness, revealing a whole aromatic range of warm notes. It is reputed as one of the great classic dark chocolate.
PREMIUM FRENCH BAKING DARK CHOCOLATE DISKS (FEVES): Perfectly sized. Easy to scale, use and melt thanks to its unique shape specially designed for baking, tempering and perfect hot chocolate.
HIGH-QUALITY INGREDIENTS: A subtle blend of the finest and most unique cocoa. The original Dark Chocolate.
COMMITTED TO SUSTAINABILITY: 100% of our cocoa is traceable to the producers - B-Corp certified - By choosing Valrhona products, you contribute to creating a more sustainable cocoa sector.
PERFECT BAKING CHOCOLATE FOR Cookies, Cakes, Mousses, Frostings, Hot Chocolate and Candies. Certified Kosher (Triangle K - Dairy). Easy Melt and Tempering.

name: Rawmio Essential Dark Chocolate Bar - Organic, Raw, Gluten-Free, 70% Cacao, 1.1 oz.
short_description: Our organic chocolate bar is not only delicious, but also rich in healthy ingredients. The composition includes potassium and protein.
Essential Dark Chocolate Bar is a milkless vegan chocolate bar made with ingredients by Rawmio. It's stone ground, raw, dairy-free, soy-free, flour-free, and gluten-free.
Contains 70% of chocolate. The composition includes: Raw Cacao Nibs, Coconut Sugar, Raw Cacao Butter.

FWe are dedicated to producing fair trade chocolate and ensuring that our farmers are fairly compensated for their products. This commitment allows for sustainable production and improved living conditions. Our company adheres to the principles of fair trade and supports cooperative growth and community development, with the goal of making a positive impact on the livelihoods of those involved in the chocolate-making process.

We employ a low-temperature stone grinding method to produce a silky-smooth texture, maintain essential nutrients and reveal cacao's delicate flavor notes. Dark, rich, intricate, and exceptionally gratifying.
